content:
Thanks. I know some things more now, and one of them is, that I should have made a BIOS update BEFORE nuking Vista. Oh well. Still, I think I'll get it out of its brick state today, and if not, I know some people at work who could possibly help me. 

Regarding motion blur, well, I really don't understand this "image stabilization can't stop motion" argument, that you hear so often. Sure, at 1/15s moving people get blurred, but as you say, it actually contributes to so many images, making the specific archetypical. I really see no fault in it ðŸ™‚
